nodes.text: Merra was a human female native of the planet Akiva. Her mother, Senator Pima Drolley represented their homeworld in the Galactic Senate of the New Republic during the waning months of the Galactic Civil War. She had one sibling, a brother named Dann.
Merra first appeared in the 2017 novel Aftermath: Empire's End, which was written by Chuck Wendig.
